about-us-paragraph: We Successfully work in UAE from last thirteen years with so many companies and Individuals . We Done and Deliever So many Project in Different areas of UAE specially in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain .
our-value-paragraph: We known as one of the best Carpenter in Abu Dhabi and AL Ain due to our best values ,ethics and quality of our work.
Safety-paragraph: Safety is one of our top most periority, for both our respectful customers and our profesional workers.
customer-service-paragraph: Customer Service is one of our biggest concern we provide the best customer services until customer get satisfied either in gathering requirements or in his required work .
integrity-paragraph: We are openly honest and humble with our customer in terms of our work. We try to advice best options to our customers and do their work with complete integrity .

footerTiming: We work 7 days a week, every day excluding major holidays.Feel free to Contact us if you want to discuss anything releted to our services, with our Contact Number and Contact form.
footerparagraph: We are well known carpenter In UAE specially in Abu Dhabi AL Ain. We provide our facilities in all areas of carpentry. We are available on instagram and Facebook
Door Manufacturing Paragraph: We manufacture all kind of wooden,plywood doors with different kind of design upon customer demand.
Door Maintenance Paragraph: We do the maintenance work of all kind of Door even wooden and aluminium door.
Wooden Shelves Paragraph: We Make different types of wooden Shelves for Store room kitchen or even for decoration.
Aluminium Doors Paragraph: We have the expertise in Aluminium doors and windows. We can make any kind of aluminium door and windows.
Kitchen Cabinet paragraph: We can make kitchen cabinet in wood and aluminium both .We have a large variety of kitchen cabinet even in Wood and Aluminium.
Custom Wooden table paragraph: We can make custom table of wood with different design and sizes depend upon our customer requirement.

quote: With over 30 years experience in ALL aspects of building and carpentry; we can tackle to all your carpentry/building, home maintenance and renovation needs.
beforeQuote: We Amjad Carpentry Company are an energetic team, highly skilled, efficient and Hardwork carpenters with the highest attention to detail and impressive creative design skills. We are honest, punctual, reliable and professional.
afterQuote: We Have a large range of precision tools and accessories to achieve that perfect job, first time, every time. We are very well known carpenter in AL Ain Abu Dhabi because of our good work and accuracy.We have done so many villas ,buildings and make work for so many builders and companies until now. We can solve any problem that comes our way.
